title: Don't Miss the Next Two Bedroom Home! Join our Waitlist Today!
posting_body: Moving is never an easy process.
We box up our belongings, weed out and toss out things we don’t need, load a moving truck, change our address, say good-bye to all we are familiar with and try something new and exciting.
Days later we tend to be exhausted, slightly hangry, and going through the “fun” process of unloading and unpacking all our stuff (probably asking ourselves…did I really need all this stuff?!).
Wouldn’t it be nice we had an assistant to get our lives back in order?
That’s why I am here for you.
To help you get through this already super-hectic process and help you find your new home with minimal hassle, a cup of coffee or a bottle of water, and a smile.
Welcome to Fenton Estates, where we offer you friendly service; from beginning to end of your time with us we are always here to help.
But that’s not all we have to offer, we also offer:
~Remodeled Apartments
~Heat and Trash Pick Up Included
~24/7 Emergency Maintenance
~We are Pet-Friendly/Dog Walking Stations Equipped with Bags on Site
~Fun Community Events and Contests Monthly
~Washer/Dryer Hookups in Ground Floor Homes
~Open Floorplans with Spacious Closets
~Online
Payment Portal
~Beautiful, Well-Maintained Grounds with Natural Wildlife
~Situated closely to US-23 and beautiful downtown Fenton
~Furnished
Units Available Upon Request (Pricing Difference from AD)
